content.text: Hey, I'm interested in learning more about you!
Cool! What would you like to know?
I love to sing and I'm also an aspiring muralist.
That's so cool! I'm not too artistic myself, but I love to listen to music. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I'm especially into indie rock and folk.
Oh, that's great! I love indie rock too. What's your favorite band?
I have a lot of favorites, but I'd have to say The National is probably my top choice.
Wow, I love The National too! They're so good.
I know, right? They're my favorite band.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a muralist. I love painting and I think it's a great way to express myself.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great muralist.
